attributes.title: What it doooo babyyy
attributes.review: This is literally the worst app I have ever used in my life. Would not load and crashed every time I opened it. I would not recommend anyone get this app because of these issues you are better off just forgetting it. If I could rate it 0 stars I would.

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: i personally think there is a much better app that will educate you more then this app and it’s called tiktok. i believe without the app some people won’t get their daily dose of serotonin and will cause SERIOUS problems. please take this into consideration mr trump then i’ll consider changing your rating to a solid 3✨

attributes.title: This app prematurely neutered my dog
attributes.review: I just got a new dog - a puppy. I named this dog Donny after my favorite president ever (trump I love trump I love) and was so excited to download this app to show my support but when I opened it, it hijacked the tracking device implanted in my dog and commanded him to chop off his own balls! Thanks, trump 🙄. I KNEW I should’ve named my dog after george bush 😡.

attributes.title: Worst app of my life
attributes.review: 🧚‍♀️✨🧚‍♀️✨🧚‍♀️✨🧚‍♀️✨❤️❤️🥺🥺😡🤧I’m not even going to front, my dog makes better apps than this. It’s so disorganized and really hard to navigate. Oh also he’s a white supremacist and a racist and oh my also extremely homophobic and transphobic. Terrible president and an even worse person. But I mean that’s cool ahaha 🧚‍♀️✨🧚‍♀️✨❤️❤️✨🧚‍♀️😭🧚‍♀️
attributes.userName: Gen z be like (i am the gen z)

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: Trump shouldn’t ban ticktock because of how popular and entertaining it is. It doesn’t deserve to get shut down when people including me love ticktock. It’s a place will people can be creative and have a support system. We don’t deserve to have that taken away from us.

attributes.title: eeeeew
attributes.review: literally the worst app ever so glitchy and crashes ever ten seconds. full of false info 🙄🙄🙄. so bad 0/10 for effort so hard to navigate and i hate having to look at the orangutans face every time i open. i only open it when i want to cry because it’s such a bad app😱😭😰TAKE THIS APP DOWN IT IS TERRIBLE!!!! ewwwwwwwwwwwww 🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and once it was fully installed I got a a reall call from Donald Duck I mean Trump and he called me a negro. I was flabbergasted that was not the only thing though. The app also caused me microwave to blow up now I can’t eat for a week:( Lastly the app infested my house with frogs and roaches. I am very disappointed!

attributes.title: DO NOT GET
attributes.review: RAMPANT racism, BLATANT homophobia, and clearly trying to take away our first amendment rights. The app itself functions poorly, with buttons rarely working and the app closing by itself every few minutes. Very bad move mister president. If you’re going to be publicly awful at least hire some decent programmers.

attributes.title: this app = 🗑
attributes.review:
i downloaded the app looking for a great way to contribute, when my phone lagged out. i went back to the app to see everything gone. there was nothing but a black screen. i re downloaded it and it did it again. terrible service = terrible app = 🗑
NEVER AGAIN WILL I DOWNLOAD THIS APP MY PHONE IS CRASHING

Worst app ever made me cry myself to sleep and my rat saw the app and immediately threw up it made my life a disgrace made me have depression and die but never again I recommend deleting the whole app of the App Store it doesn’t deserve to see the light of day or night I hope it dies and also trump 2020 🇺🇸in a ✨casket ✨please and yeah so BYE
